scenario_text.value:
She... She looks just like her. Who is she?
What’s Kaito complaining about?
I have no idea. We’ll just have to find out.
What?! Really?! Not that I care...

What? I said I didn’t care, okay? You guys
deal with this!

Kaito and that woman are saying completely
different things. Whose story do we trust?
Huh? What makes you say that?

She... She reminds me of Mommy. Not how she
looks. But she... She makes me feel the same.

And Mommy’s always right. So she must be
right...
Uh... I’m not so sure about that.

It... It couldn’t be, could it? Could she
be...Mommy?

Yes, that’s it! It’s Mommy! She’s come to
save me!

Haha...yes, it has to be her! Mommy’s always
there for me when I need her!
Ryo, come on, get a grip!

(I’m not sure I can trust Ryo’s analysis
given the state he’s in.)

It’s her...she’s my mommy... She’s right...
She’s always right. Heeheeheehee!
